burn(address,uint256).details: Performs burn action on PFWETH and unwraps WETH back to ETH for the caller.

params._credit: The amount of PFToken to burn.
params._to: The address to send ETH to.

returns.amount: The amount of ETH to be received.

burnWithPermit(address,uint256,uint256,u.details: Similar to burn function, but with an additional call to BToken's EIP712 permit.

mint(address).details: Wraps the given ETH to WETH and calls mint action on PFWETH for the caller.

returns.credit: The BWETH amount minted to the caller.

documentation.text:
@dev Initializes the PFWETH contract
 @param _pfweth PFWETH token address
@dev Similar to burn function, but with an additional call to BToken's EIP712 permit.
